@Shogunreaper wrote:

Just search the forums for ancient switch command, its just ::switch and it switches you between magics.

item.title: Ancient switch
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

Did You Put The Dark Mage At The Bottom Of The Autospawn.cfg? I’m not familiar with Project Czar, I like using my own scratch servers… so I’m not sure if the same rules apply.
But when I used to use other sources you would have to put shop and talk/quest npcs at the top of the list and monsters at the bottom, I understand it sounds stupid but, I’m not the one who made those stupid sources… Try it and get back to me plz

Hope it works,
~Scootkid

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient switch
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:
@kaelen92 wrote:

Ok, I have a a Project Czar source and i HATE the start point so I decided to change it. i was adding all the portals and objects to my new area when i came across the ancient altar…idk how to move it so i browzed through Client.Java hopefully finding some way to move it. Then i saw thisNpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; sendMessage("You teleport to the abyss."); teleportToX = 3040; teleportToY = 4842; }else if (NpcDialogue == 1002) { // Dark Mage NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("The dark mage converts back to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("The dark mage converts you to ancient magicks!"); }
I thought I was saved. I spawned a dark mage at my new home spot (actually there are 2 dark mages, tried both) I saved, compiled, tried to talk to him and nothing happened. could someone please tell me how i can get some way of switching to ancients at me new home spot please.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2008, 05:14:35 PM[/size][hr]1/10 topics I make actually get a reply…this is typical, no one cares.

Read full topic
